basics.name: Plamen Mitev
basics.label: Developer
basics.summary: Game Developer specializing in JavaScript, Unity, and front‑end game systems. Experienced in building real‑time interactive games, slot mechanics, UI systems, and performance‑optimized animations. Strong background in both web technologies and game engines, with hands‑on production experience across multiple studios.

work.name: Evolution
work.summary: Developing front‑end systems for online slot games using JavaScript, TypeScript, Pixi.js, and GSAP. Responsible for implementing game logic, UI flows, animations, and performance‑critical features used by thousands of concurrent players. Collaborate closely with designers, artists, and backend teams to deliver polished, stable, and visually engaging game experiences.
highlights: Implemented interactive UI components, features, and animations for multiple online slot games.
Optimized rendering performance and asset handling, reducing frame drops and improving smoothness.
Collaborated with cross‑functional teams to integrate new features and maintain high production quality.

work.name: Wiener Games
work.summary: Developed slot games using TypeScript, Cocos Creator, and Pixi.js. Built core gameplay systems including reels, paylines, bonus features, and game states. Worked closely with designers and artists to integrate assets and tune gameplay behavior.
highlights: Implemented slot mechanics such as reel spinning, symbol evaluation, and bonus triggers.
Built reusable UI components and animation systems for multiple game projects.
Improved game performance by optimizing update loops, asset loading, and scene transitions.
